articles.author: Esther Webber
articles.title: Oh, Mr President … Biden gets his titles mixed up during Prime Minister Rishi Sunak's first White House visit - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Joe Biden momentarily seems confused about who he’s meeting as Rishi Sunak drops in at the White House.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON, D.C. First he renamed the British prime minister “Rashee Sanook.” Now Joe Biden has bestowed Rishi Sunak with a whole new job title which doesn’t actually exist in the U.K.
Welcoming the… [+2157 chars]
